title: Gigi Hadid cuts a cool figure in preppy grey blazer and joggers
text:
She may be back on the market after splitting from Bachelorette hunk Tyler Cameron, but Gigi Hadid is not letting heartbreak slow her down.

The catwalk queen was spotted enjoying a night out with Queer Eye star Antoni Porowski on Monday.

The pair enjoyed some quality time together over dinner at the popular Bondst restaurant in New York City.

Gigi and Antoni: Gigi Hadid was spotted enjoying a night out with Queer Eye star Antoni Porowski on Monday

Gigi showed no signs of emotion while strolling alongside Anotoni while rocking a pair of sunglasses on past sunset.

She wore her curly brunette hair up into a stylish high ponytail with a yellow scrunchie as she carried a black purse.

She was wearing a cream-colored top with several gold necklaces under a grey suit coat.

Shades: Gigi showed no signs of emotion while strolling alongside Antoni while rocking a pair of sunglasses on past sunset

Hadid completed her look with black pants ticked into thick black Doc Martens boots as she strolled into dinner.

Porowski was wearing a $720 Ambush hoodie over a grey top, with ripped blue jeans for his dinner outing.

He completed his dinner look with a pair of white Adidas low-top sneakers.

Stylish: She wore her curly brunette hair up into a stylish high ponytail with a yellow scrunchie as she carried a black purse.

Hadid's outing comes after her apparent split with The Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron, following just a few months of dating.

Hadid and Cameron were first rumored to be romantically linked when they started following each other on Instagram in late July, and they were seen at Soho House in Brooklyn on August 4.

Hadid then brought Cameron to the Republic Records party following the MTV Video Music Awards in last August, where they were spotted kissing.

Gigi's split: Hadid's outing comes after her apparent split with The Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron, following just a few months of dating

Cameron even attended the funeral of Hadid's grandmother, seen consoling her throughout the funeral which seemed to solidify their relationship status.

Still, shortly after the funeral, Cameron seemed to downplay their relationship.

'She’s an amazing person. We’ve had a great time together. We’ve hung out a few times. That’s all,' he said.

Staus: Cameron even attended the funeral of Hadid's grandmother, seen consoling her throughout the funeral which seemed to solidify their relationship status

Kissing: Hadid then brought Cameron to the Republic Records party following the MTV Video Music Awards in last August, where they were spotted kissing

Gigi: Gigi Hadid rocks a grey coat while out with Antoni Porowski
description: She may be back on the market after splitting from Bachelorette hunk Tyler Cameron, but Gigi Hadid is not letting heartbreak slow her down.
